languages.text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer can't be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has Imperialis — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Imperialis and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text:
战斗开始时，装备者获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
装备者免疫{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果。
如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——信奉者，则每有1级“教条主义”信念级别，决心就会提高2点，且免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
战斗开始时，装备者获得额外{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，等同于装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。
装备者免疫{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}效果。
如果装备者拥有信念：{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——信奉者，则每有1级“教条主义”信念级别，决心就会提高2点，且免疫{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}效果。

languages.text:
В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Также персонажа нельзя замедлить.
Если он обладает убеждением {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — поборник, то получает +2 к решимости за каждый уровень убеждения, а также иммунитет к {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиживанию{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Также персонажа нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлить{/g}.
Если он обладает мировоззрением Империум — поборник, то получает +50% к решимости до конца боя и иммунитет к обездвиживанию.

В начале боя персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} в количестве, равном {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимости{/g}.
Также персонажа нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}замедлить{/g}.
Если он обладает мировоззрением Империум — поборник, то получает +50% к решимости до конца боя и иммунитет к обездвиживанию.

languages.text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}に等しい数の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}にならない。
使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 信奉者がいる場合、教条主義のランクごとに決断力が2増加して、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}にはならない。
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
戦闘開始時、使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}と同等の{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を獲得する。
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}速度低下{/g}できない。
使用者が帝国 ― 信奉者を有している場合、戦闘終了時まで決断力が50％増え、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}にはなれない。

languages.text:
Al comienzo del combate, el portador obtiene una cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
El portador no puede sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Devoto, obtiene +2 de firmeza hasta finalizar el combate y no puede sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al comienzo del combate, el portador obtiene una cantidad de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} equivalente a su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g}.
El portador no puede sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}.
Si el portador tiene Imperialis: Devoto, obtiene +50 % de firmeza hasta finalizar el combate y no puede sufrir el efecto {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Der Träger kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} werden.
Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} — Geweihter, erhält er +2 Entschlossenheit für jeden Dogmatiker-Rang und kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} werden.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn des Kampfes erhält der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} entsprechend seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g}.
Der Träger kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}verlangsamt{/g} werden.
Hat der Träger Imperialis – Geweihter, erhält er +50 % Entschlossenheit bis zum Ende des Kampfes und kann nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} werden.

languages.text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur reçoit un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
L'utilisateur ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur possède {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Disciple, il bénéficie de +2 de détermination par rang Dogmatique et ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au début du combat, l'utilisateur reçoit un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
L'utilisateur ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur possède Imperialis — Disciple, il bénéficie de +50 % de détermination jusqu'à la fin du combat et ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

Au début du combat, l'utilisateur reçoit un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} égal à sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g}.
L'utilisateur ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}.
Si l'utilisateur possède Imperialis — Disciple, il bénéficie de +50 % de détermination jusqu'à la fin du combat et ne peut pas subir l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

languages.text:
Takan kişi, çatışma başladığında {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerine eşit miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} kazanır.
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlatılamaz{/g}.
Takan kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Coşkulu kanaatine sahipse Dogmatik'teki her kademesi için +2 kararlılık kazanır ve {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} edilemez.
languages.original_text:
At the start of combat, the wearer gains {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} equal to their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}.
The wearer cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}.
If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Votary, they gain +2 resolve for each rank in Dogmatic and cannot be {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.
